title: New Angular 19 ASP.NET Core Identity Auth Tailwind SPA Template

title: AI Server - May 2025 Update
summary: New SOTA LLMs added, support for thinking responses, Ollama Vision Models & Generate API

title: Text to Blazor upgraded to use best coding LLMs
summary: Text to Blazor now generates CRUD Apps using best coding models from Google, Anthropic, Meta, DeepSeek & Mistral
author: Demis Bellot

title: Complete Admin UI Management for Identity Claims and Roles
summary: With support for adding Roles and User and Role Claims, the built-in Admin UI now offers complete Identity Auth management

title: In Depth and Interactive API Analytics available to all ServiceStack Apps
summary: Comprehensive and Interactive API Analytics in Admin UI offering deep insights into API usage, performance, users, API Keys & IPs.
author: Demis Bellot

title: llms.txt and llms-full.txt support for Razor SSG and Razor Press
summary: Free Razor SSG and Razor Press Static Site Templates now auto generates llms.txt and llms-full.txt files for Large Language Models
author: Demis Bellot

title: Generate CRUD APIs and Admin UIs from existing DBs
summary: Use the metadata from an existing RDBMS to generate AutoQuery CRUD APIs and Admin UIs for managing your data.
author: Demis Bellot

title: FREE CLI Access to the worlds most popular AI Models
summary: No API Keys, no Signups, just free access to the worlds most popular AI Large Language Models
author: Demis Bellot

title: New okai tool for Rapid App Development
summary: Explore the new okai tool and workflow for rapidly developing Blazor Vue Crud Apps with AI and TypeScript Data Models

title: Text to Blazor Vue CRUD Apps
